creditline: The Jane and James Emison Endowmen for Native American Art
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: light tan hide; beaded bodice on front and back with black, white, red, and yellow beads in arcing horizontal rows on front and back, and band of beads on top of each sleeve; hide fringe below bands of beads with larger blue, brown, black, red, and green beads; hide fringe at bottom hem, sides, beneath sleeves, and on sleeve openings
medium: Mountain sheep hide and sinew, glass beads, hemp
title: Dress
